com.ibm.jikes.skij
Class ListenerConsole

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.ibm.jikes.skij.ListenerConsole
public class ListenerConsole
extends Object

Start up a listener on the console (with its own thread). this class exists solely so that application code can do:

Class.forName("com.ibm.jikes.skij.ListenerConsole").newInstance();
This allows an application to start up Skij easily without having any nonreflective references to Skij classes (so it can still be compiled without Skij).

See Also:
ListenerWindow
